google_translated: It is a curry feast

en_text: There must be other ways to let the players relax.
jp_text: 選手たちに息抜きさせるにしろ
google_translated: To breathe to players

en_text: What if something bad happens?
jp_text: 何か問題でも起きたら　どうするんだ
google_translated: What if something happens?

en_text: Nothing will happen.
jp_text: 何も起きてないよ
google_translated: Nothing happens

en_text: Look, everyone is eating the curry peacefully.
jp_text: 見ろよ　みんなで仲よく　カレー食べてら
google_translated: Look at everyone, eating curry well

en_text: The curry is really good!
jp_text: カレー　おいしくなってますよ！
google_translated: Curry is delicious!

en_text: There are only 11 people playing on the field.
jp_text: ピッチに立って　プレーするのは１１人
google_translated: 11 people stand in pitch

en_text: But you can't get through the long season with just that.
jp_text: でも　それだけじゃ　リーグ戦の長丁場は戦えない
google_translated: But I can not fight the Nagare of the league match

en_text: Those on the bench, the management, the fans...
jp_text: ベンチ　フロント　サポーター　クラブに携わる　たくさんの人
google_translated: Many people involved in the benchfront supporter club

en_text: All of them have to be united and fight for the same cause.
jp_text: そのすべてが同じ方向を向いて
google_translated: All of them face the same direction

en_text: ETU will become much more stronger if that happens.
jp_text: それができりゃ　ＥＴＵは　もっともっと強くなる
google_translated: ETU will be more stronger

en_text: The king has returned!
jp_text: 王様のご帰還だ！
google_translated: It is the return of the king!

en_text: Certainly, we saw it there -
jp_text: 確かに俺たちはそこで見た
google_translated: Certainly we saw there

en_text: A dream-like reality where a weak team defeats a strong one.
jp_text: 弱いチームが強いチームをやっつける夢のような現実
google_translated: A dream-like reality that makes a weak team with a strong team

en_text: We saw the miracle known as Giant Killing.
jp_text: ジャイアントキリングという奇跡を
google_translated: A miracle called Giant Killing

en_text: Yeah, these guys can do it.
jp_text: ああ　こいつらは　なれるよ
google_translated: Oh, I can do it

en_text: They can become such a club.
jp_text: そういうクラブにさ
google_translated: In such a club

en_text: So, please take care of these bills.
jp_text: ほんじゃ　これ
google_translated: This

en_text: The season is far from over!
jp_text: シーズンは　まだまだ　これからだ　張り切っていこうぜ！
google_translated: The season is still from now on!

en_text: Glory East Tokyo United
jp_text: 「Ｇｌｏｒｙ　Ｅａｓｔ　Ｔｏｋｙｏ　Ｕｎｉｔｅｄ　Ｇｌｏｒｙ　Ｅａｓｔ　Ｔｏｋｙｏ　Ｕｎｉｔｅｄ」
google_translated: "Glory East Tokyo United Glory East TOKYO UNITED"
